title: SPY: Not sure...
name: Steversteves
contents:
Hey,

So I didn't post anything leading into this week (well I did, but on ES) because I am really not sure.
I mean, there are the math targets of course, but I really don't know which I preferred and prob wise, its never wise to trust fully on major news weeks.

I was somewhat long biased starting into this week, however this was the wrong move and this actually got kyboshed really quickly when the market did not start with the big gapping down I was hoping for.

I am going to be very brief because I really have nothing insightful to share. So here it is:

SPY has been hugging its linear regression line. It really is not moving. Despite the big ups and downs we had these past 2 days, if you look at the chart, SPY and the market as a whole has literally been hugging its mean.

We are now approaching the point where, if SPY is to remain in this regression channel it has been in since August, our bullish targets are pretty much off the table. As of tomorrow, our weekly and mothly bullish targets will be pretty much outside of the regression trend. They would take SPY breaking out to the upside from this well asserted channel.

How likely is that?

Not very, my friends. Not very.
But not impossible either.

So that leaves us with our bearish targets which we are close to hitting. And in fact, we have already hit our weekly bearish targets on ES:


If there was ever a time for support to be found and a bounce to be had, it would be here. As futures is now technically on its range support.

Will it hold?
Probably not.

But futures is in the same dilemma with its monthly highs outside of its regression channel range:


Again, this is a well established channel with a very high Pearson correlation.

That said, with CPI anything can happen. And to be honest, because we are straddling the mean, I am not so certain of selling here. I mean, the obvious answer is short it into CPI but maybe its too obvious.

The overall probabilities this week were bullish favouring. However, I have seen the probabilities fail many times on CPI and FOMC weeks, so I don't take this seriously.

I am actually personally not overly confident one way or another here. This isn't an obvious setup like jobs data was.

That said, I don't really expect SPY to be able to realistically break out of this regression downtrend to the upside. IT just seems so very unlikely. It would be the ultimate F you to the world for this to just go parabolic to the upside and breakout. But it honestly wouldn't be the first time the market has given us all the middle finger. So being open minded is important.

The probabilities on the monthly actually favour further downside. However, based on stochastics alone, there is a favouring of bullishness, but in the totality of the technicals (stochastics, RSI , Z Score etc)there is a general favouring of bearishness.

Verdict:
I am overall bearish , expecting further downside. I am expecting us to hit our monthly lows at some point this month because overall the probabilities favour a bearish continuation on the monthly timeframes.

That said, I am mixed on the weekly really.
Looking at other tickers like AMZN and MSFT , we have yet to hit the monthly lows, with tickers like AMZN , TSLA and MSFT having a high probabiltiy favouring of the monthly lows.
This leads me to believe that, in the totality of the market, CPI should result in downside to bring these tickers to their monthly lows and to bring SPY deep into its weekly lows.

That said, I am actually going to position myself conservatively going into CPI . While there really is no reason to play pre-CPI, you can honestly bank once you have the direction confirmed at 8:30, I am probably going to do a really inexpensive straddle on IWM . Weekly expiries (Friday) in either direction, knowing very well that we are going to see a dramatic move one way or the other. That way I can rest assured that I don't really need to care what the market decides.


My thoughts,
Trade safe!

Leave your comments, questions and critiques below!!

title: DJI Potential For Bearish Continuation
name: VantageMarkets
contents:
On the H4 chart, the overall bias for DJI is bearish . To add confluence to this, price is below the Ichimoku cloud which indicates a bearish market. Overnight, price has continued to consolidate around the 29650 area where the previous swing low is located. Looking for a sell entry at 30033.46 where the 23.6% Fibonacci line is located. There is a market gap near the sell entry which adds confluence to the area. Stop loss will be placed at 30840.50 where the 382% Fibonacci line is located. Take profit will be at 27215.49 where the -27.2% Fibonacci expansion and 161.8% Fibonacci extension is located.

contents:

title: #Bitcoin Sellers Press on, Eyeing $18.5k
name: Bitcoin_Analyzer
contents:
Past Performance of Bitcoin
Bitcoin price action ticks in favor of sellers. Amid highly fragile and uncertain market conditions, BTC buyers cannot reverse the prevailing bear trend. Subsequently, aggressive traders can find entries to ride the current trend, unloading on every attempt higher, with targets at immediate multi-week support lines spread between $17.5k and $19k.

#Bitcoin Technical Analysis
The BTC price chart points to weakness and bears that have been pushing Bitcoin bulls to the edge. From the BTCUSDT arrangement in the daily chart , prices have broken below a rising (minor) channel, the bear flag , pointing to strong waves of selling pressure set in motion by the bearish engulfing bar of September 13.
Therefore, if past trends describe future formations, BTC may likely retest September 2022 lows at around $18k and $18.5k. Subsequently, as long as prices are below $20.5k and October 2022 highs, BTC could continue dropping in upcoming sessions, further dimming hopes of revival for optimistic traders.
Following recent losses, the short-term trend has been defined. As such, traders can redouble their liquidation efforts, targeting $18.5k in the immediate term.

What to Expect from #BTC?
BTC bears are in control, and any attempt for higher highs has been quashed. In light of this development, the immediate trend will be southwards unless there is an unexpected bullish engulfing bar driving price above $20k with rising trading volumes.
Resistance level to watch out for: $20.5k
Support level to watch out for: $18.5k

Disclaimer: Opinions expressed are not investment advice. Do your research.

title: BTC ANALYSIS 15m
name: DanelloNZ
contents:
Analysis of BTC /USDT/PERPETUAL/BINANCE
15m time frame
In this time frame, the price has a downward trend line and the price is crossing this line.
If the price crosses the resistance zone of $19198 with a valid candle and stabilizes above this resistance zone , the impulsive and kinetic scenario will be activated and we will expect the price to grow up to the resistance zones of $19504 and $19693, respectively.
Also, if the price crosses the support area of $18982 with a valid candle and stabilizes the price lower than the adjacent valley, the correction scenario will continue and we will expect price correction to the support areas of $18845 and $18591, respectively.

GOOD LUCK

title: #BTC DAILY UPDATE !!
name: Domino_Crypto
contents:
As BTC broke below the rising wedge pattern and is currently it's moving downside towards its possible bottom of $18k which is almost 6% low from the current level.

There is a high chance that BTC can move down towards 18k which is not should be the reason for panic, if you are here for the long term then you will understand this, 18k level will be the better accumulation zone for the upcoming months.

Let’s see how it goes in the upcoming days, candle close below the lower support zone will be an invalidation of this chart analysis.

So, do your own research before any trade and hit the like button if you find this analysis helpful.

This is not financial advice.

Thank you.

title: Bitcoin – $17300 in October!
name: SkyrexTrading
contents:
Hello, everyone!

I found another one super realistic scenario which confirms that the bottom could be this month. Locally I did couple mistakes according to trading chaos approach on the 1h timeframe. I will continue study trading chaos, but today let’s use the classical TA tools.

Using 1D timeframe lets analyze the mid-term scenario. If we take a look at the last 3 months the price every time found support at the S1 monthly levels. It is the support line which is often respected, thus from time to time I use it in my analysis. I want you to bring your attention that in October the S1 is located at $17300, which is only $200 below that the lowest point of this bear market. The slight lower low is the perfect reversal setup. In this case we will see enough fear to activate the panic sellers and at the same time the liquidity provision to the large players. Moreover the lower low can be the evidence of the bearish wave 5 end which is in conjunction with the MACD divergence will enhance the long signal.

Best regards, Ivan

title: BULLISH GOLD-5900 Pips
name: Ejike_Odeh
contents: Gold have made lots moves of the past few days to the Bearish perceptive but a double bottom chart pattern also formed at .50 / 0.618 Fib region bring a kind of confluence with the S&R minor zone, by this indication, Uncle GOLD is technical set for a BULLISH day rise of +/- 5900 Pips

title: ETH - A busy, but important chart
name: cryptovatsik
contents:
Okay yes there's a lot of lines on this one, I puked all my thoughts out onto it and tried my best to explain with text. I categorized this as a Long, however with potential more downside first... here's why.

Summary:

- want to reclaim 50th percentile of the overall fib (and breakout of downward sloping channel, at the least the channel eq)
- want to hold current support @ 1281
- if triangle is in play, target below in yellow back to downward sloping range low
- previous range base was also a significant range form January 2021, interesting is all
- elliot wave counts left out, might upload those later but they're on my YT
- bearish order block above in red (tapped twice)
- 786 fib is a must hold imo if we want no lower

Let me know what you think of Ethereum's current price action - in the comments!

V
